mapper.sql: /*[TbMetaPjtM.xml][select][TANINE]*/ SELECT CMPNY_CD , PJT_CD , PJT_STA_DY , PJT_END_DY , SYS_CD , PJT_TPIC_EMPNO , PJT_TPIC_TELNO , PJT_TPIC_EMAIL , US_YN , CRT_DTM , CRT_ID , MDF_DTM , MDF_ID FROM TB_META_PJT_M WHERE CMPNY_CD = #{cmpny_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PJT_CD = #{pjt_cd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
